posts.excerpt: Quote: Those who still think the biopic is a boring and routine genre have an unbeatable occasion to let Boro in the Box change their minds. posts.title: Mata Atlantica
posts.excerpt: Quote: A young girl disappears in a forest in the heart of São Paulo, Brazil.

posts.title: Ku Qian
posts.excerpt: Furiously developing Eastern China has been inhabited by enlarging number of immigrants. In search for better tomorrow, they become violent and corrupted.

posts.title: Una
posts.excerpt: A woman confronts an older man, her former neighbour, to find out why he abandoned her after they had a sexual relationship when she was thirteen.

posts.title: Rocco

posts.title: Hardcore [+commentaries]
